Online Corpus - Email protection and cyber security solutions

We bring cyber security closer to you

Our team consists of cyber crime investigators, forensic analysts and professional developers. Our goal is to make your experince with Internet safer. Combined, our knowledge brings you the best from all fields.

Email Protector

Cyber security should not be compromised on. But what do we actually know about cyber security?
Are we safe?

Hackers nowadays proved to be extremely creative and their favourite tool is social engineering. There are different types of attacks that could be executed, but the one most commonly known among cyber security professionals and most commonly used by cyber criminals is called phishing. Criminals infiltrate your private life, email and chat correspondence and thus, one way or another, gain access to everything that you try so hard to keep away from them - your money.

This is where our knowledge can help you. By installing Email Protector, you can be sure that the email correspondence you're leading is with the people you've already trusted.

Our Chrome extension provides new and revolutionary means to keep cyber criminals out of your correspondence. No more phishing or man in the email attacks. This extension provides you with the virtual security that you need. Click here to read more about Email Protector!

  • The mission of Online Corpus

    2019-04-14 2019-04-14
    Georgi Spasov
    onlinecorpus
    cybercrime  onlinecorpus

    According to Europol cybercrime investigators, income from cybercrime and cybercrime related activities in some European countries, has surpassed the income from drug trafficking and drug distribution for 2018

    Ever wondered how people got as far as they are? Well, we did. The never-ending strive to know how things function the way they do made us discover very interesting things. Judging by how fast the world is changing, the next couple of decades will be one hell of a rollercoaster - technologically, politically and economically.

    But some things don’t change. As individuals, we have to satisfy different levels of needs in order to continue surviving and evolving - at least that’s what Abraham Maslow states.

    The feeling of security several thousand years ago was something slightly different than now - back in the day people had no houses like us now, the only thing that they had was a tribe and some huts. And if we examine closely their habits, we will find a lot of differences with our current lifestyle.
